name: Skinny
description: Skinny is a weak horror game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000 or better Storage: 1800 MB available space
